Rhode Island becomes 10th state to legalize same-sex marriage

Gov. Lincoln Chafee signed the bill into law on the State House steps tonight after a final 56-15 vote. The first weddings will take place Aug. 1. (7:13 p.m.)

Business & Money

Intel names insider as CEO

Intel has chosen its chief operating officer, Brian Krzanich, as its new CEO. He will steer the world’s largest chipmaker in an era where PC sales are cratering while smartphones and tablets thrive.
